Description: 36 fragments of papyrus extracted from cartonnage with demotic text, in some cases, on both sides.
Curator's comments: On the basis of the script and the papyrus, most of these fragments probably belong to the same text. In most cases they are very small and contain only a few words. On one of the larger fragments (top right-hand corner) there are some day-dates followed by names, which suggest an accounts papyrus. Some of the small fragments contain names, in a couple of cases day dates (in one case a month) and on one piece a year date, 'written (in) regnal-year 30 (?)'.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380787) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380787)
